roleset.name: enjoy
roleset.note: RELISH-V NOTES: Too bad this verb isn't also in class 9.9 (butter), or "John relishedhis hot dog" could be delightfully ambiguous. (from relish.01-v)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Mr. Wathen also relished the chance to demonstrate an entrepreneur like himself, who'd spent his whole career in the security business, could run Pinkerton's better than an unfocused conglomerate or investment banker.
example.arg: the chance to demonstrate an entrepreneur like himself, who'd spent his whole career in the security business, could run Pinkerton's better than an unfocused conglomerate or investment banker
